subtitleNullable: This dataset contains all the IMDb top 1000 movies
descriptionNullable:
The IMDb Top 1000 Movies dataset is a treasure trove of information about the most esteemed films in cinematic history. It includes a comprehensive collection of attributes that can fuel numerous insightful analyses and visualizations.

Title: The title of the movie.
Year: The year the movie was released.
Rating: The IMDb rating of the movie, reflecting its overall popularity and reception.
Duration: The runtime of the movie in minutes.
Genre: The genre(s) to which the movie belongs (e.g., Drama, Action, Adventure).
IMDb Rank: The rank of the movie within the IMDb Top 1000 list.
Metascore: The Metascore assigned to the movie, offering a critical review of its quality.
Director: The director(s) responsible for bringing the movie to life.
Stars: The lead actors and actresses who play pivotal roles in the movie.
Votes: The number of user votes the movie has received on IMDb, reflecting its popularity.
Gross: The gross earnings of the movie at the box office or through various distribution channels.
Description: A brief synopsis or overview of the movie's plot, theme, or significance.
